content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Ryanah. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. However, I would like to clarify that I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay the highest possible rent for this 25 square meter apartment. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay the highest possible rent for this 25 square meter apartment. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Ryanah. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was thinking a rental price of €800 per month. Is that a price you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €800 per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Understood. I am happy to accept your rental price of €800 per month. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
